sentence: HAPPY BIRTHDAY: Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.) … Reps. Steven Palazzo (R-Miss.)
title: POLITICO Playbook: The reasons for optimism — but more pessimism — in Ukraine

sentence: According to Oli Stokolosa, a Ukraine native and organizer who has lived in Arizona for about 10 years, one of the goals of the protest was to demand action from U.S. Sen. Mark Kelly and Sinema to deliver the urgency of the message to the White House.
author: Laura Daniella Sepulveda
title: 'I want Arizonans to be aware': Ukrainians in Phoenix call for more 'severe' action from US against Russia

sentence: A spokesman for Sen. Kyrsten Sinema, D-Ariz., said she “and her team continue to engage with the U.S. State Department to ensure Ms. Griner is safe and has the appropriate support and assistance.” A spokesman for Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., who sits on the Senate Armed Services Committee, said the senator is concerned about Griner’s “well-being and safe return, and we are working with the State Department to ensure this is a top priority.” Sen. John Cornyn, R-Texas, who sits on the Select Committee on Intelligence, has also been in touch with the State Department, a spokesperson confirmed.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Brittney Griner 'just a token' in Russia's efforts against US, political experts say

sentence: The Complex AIR FORCE READY TO SEND F-16 FIGHTERS TO POLAND: Air Combat Command chief Gen. MARK KELLY said the Air Force is prepared to deliver F-16s to Poland if asked to do so by the Biden administration as part of a larger deal to help Ukraine defend against Russia, per our own LEE HUDSON (for Pros!).
title: Poland gets its close-up
